Napix.#info: The default configuration for a Napix server. Directives starting by a # are comments.

auth.#service: The name of the service of this host.
auth.#password: The password of this napix server
auth.#get_parameter: The name of the GET parameter used for non-secured authentication
auth.#hosts: A string or a list of string listing the server names

notify.#url: The URL of the notify server

credentials.#info: The credential used by this server to send notifications

notify.#delay: The interval at which this sever sends notifications

#storage.#store: The default backend for Key value storage

#available stores.napixd.store.backends.file.FileBackend: Store each collection in a file
#available stores.napixd.store.backends.file.DirectoryBack: Store each collection in a directory and each key in a file
#available stores.napixd.store.backends.redis.RedisBackend: Store each collection in a Redis key
#available stores.napixd.store.backends.redis.RedisHashBac: Store each collection as a Redis Hash
#available stores.napixd.store.backends.redis.RedisKeyBack: Store the list of the keys of a collection as a set and each key as a Redis key

managers.#info: The list of the managers in this server. They key is the URL prefix, the value is a dotted python path to the manager class
